text: Hagi ana zafama trakama huno'ma nemaseno vagri'ma hia agasasa kenu mago'a mopafi vahera Nagra zamazeri koro hu'noe. Hagi fri kumapima nevaza vahe'enema huntoge'noma nevige'za, Idenima me'naza zafamo'zane knare'nare zafama Lebanoni me'naza zafamo'zane, knare'ma hu'za tima e'neriza zafamo'zanena fri vahe kumapi mani'ne'za musena hu'naze.
